name: Art Within
description:
A coming of age tale --  in 2.5D! Brush in hand, conquer your challenges and reshape your inner mind! Defeat your fears, solve your way through mental blocks, and fill in the path to your dream of becoming an artist. Traverse the dream world as you gather inspiration for your real-world college application. Learn about yourself and your path as you go on your journey!

The project served as the team's CAPSTONE 2,  2nd Term, AY 2021 - 2022, under the BS IEMC program at De La Salle College of Saint Benilde.
